name: Second Stellar
summary:
Follow Asphodene and Eridani on their star-spanning adventure to portend the mysteries of their existence. Actively wield myriad weapons and their abilities in symphony to defeat those who would bar your path. Throughout your journey, court intriguing and vibrant passengers as you venture beyond the stars above.

This adventure won't be easy- Hordes of foes will stand in your way, and you must answer their challenge to progress. Emerging triumphant against these foes will reward experience, catalyzed into unique items and upgrades to bolster your offense.
